name: Inaris "Sole" Crossbow
description: Using arrows and talents interchangeably with other crossbows, the Inaris "Sole" Crossbow is geared more towards elemental damage. When paired with Bolts that deal elemental damage ( Obsidian Bolts , Larkwell Martinez Charged Bolts , etc), the Inaris "Sole" Crossbow can pack a punch, making it a decent, if not expensive, upgrade to the previous Workshop Crossbows. Dealt elemental damage is not affected by Crossbow talents.
